overview_of_class: Introduction to Graph Theory: graphs, trees, Euler tours & Hamiltonian cycles, matchings, planar graphs, colorings, networks. Additional topics as time permits. Prerequisites: 291-1, 300, 306, or equivalent.
name: Graph Theory
title: WCAS MATH 308-0-41 Graph Theory
